column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////If you've been around the block when it comes to Chicago deep dish
column2: I'm sure you have strong feelings about where it's best. But this newbie couldn't get over the butter crust
column4: and tender Italian sausage. My boyfriend (who introduced me to Lou Malnati's...yes
column5: we're pretty open about these kind of things) & I enjoyed some cold 312s while we waited for our pie
column6: reclining in the leather armchairs at our table. The chairs made it a little hard to eat our pizza - I leaned forward a lot - but were lovely to relax in before the food came
column7: and after the server departed with our empty pie tin.
